Header: Dead body found in Mannar jungle (Photos)
Content: Police say the body of a 56-year-old person was found in a jungle area in Madu, Mannar. The deceased was a resident of Anandakulam and he had been working as a barber. Police said the victim was reported missing from 25th of October. The body has been taken to Mannar Hospital for postmortem. Madu Police is conducting investigations.
